root.name: Fuuun Shaolin Kyo: Ankoku no Maou
root.description: OverviewFuuun Shaolin Kyo: Ankoku no Maou (roughly "Elemental Kung Fu: Satan's Darkness") is a sequel to the original Fuuun Shaolin Kyo, also for the Famicom Disk System. As in that game, the goal is to fight a series of opponents using Shaolin martial arts.One of the few notable features added to this sequel are the cutscenes, which play out like visual novels. The player witnesses events unfold after each battle and can occasionally select between multiple opponents for the next bout.
